name: Pygma - Export HTML and CSS from Figma
description:
Export frames from Figma to HTML and CSS in a few clicks.


Step 1: Sign up for Pygma at https://pygma.app. You're activity on the plugin will be synced there.


Step 2: Authenticate with Figma. We need access to read the information associated with your Figma files. This doesn't allow Pygma to delete or overwrite any of your files.


Step 3: Open the plugin and select the frames that you want to generate code from. You will need to add your Figma file key so we can get the right data. Click generate code. A link to your generated code should be prepared within 10 seconds.


Any problems, please reach out to emile@pygma.app and I'll fix your export for free if the plugin didn't work well.
